IONIAN SEA.
GREECE TO ITALY.
VESSEL, 11 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
CORFU (39-40N 019-45E) TO VICINITY 39-00N 018-00E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
